description: Audio-reactive visual generation using Odyssey API with Dino 26 cyberpunk prehistoric lore

dino.aesthetics: Chrome-scaled apex predator with bioluminescent neon veins pulsing through metallic hide
dino.environment: Neon-lit prehistoric jungle merged with decaying cyberpunk cityscape
dino.personality: Ancient intelligence awakened in digital age - curious yet territorial
special_features: Glitch-effect scales that flicker between organic and digital
Eyes glow with shifting neon colors (green/pink/yellow)
Roar creates visible sound waves in neon spectrum
Leaves trails of digital particles when moving

high_energy.scene_description: Dino charging through neon jungle at full sprint, lightning effects crackling, camera rapidly tracking from low angle, glitch artifacts intensifying with each roar

medium_energy.scene_description: Dino prowling through glitching cyber-ruins at steady pace, neon signs flickering overhead, camera orbiting smoothly, digital rain falling

low_energy.scene_description: Dino observing from cliff overlooking sprawling cyberpunk cityscape during sunset, camera slowly panning across vista, bioluminescent plants glowing softly, peaceful yet melancholic

silent.scene_description: Close-up of Dino's eye reflecting neon city lights, camera completely still, only subtle breathing animation, stars visible above ruins

glitch.description: VHS distortion, digital artifacts, RGB split

prehistoric.description: Lush vegetation, primordial atmosphere, ancient textures

cyberpunk.description: Decaying technology, holographic ads, rain-slicked surfaces

environments.name: Neon Jungle
environments.description: Dense prehistoric forest with bioluminescent plants and neon-lit canopy

environments.name: Cyber Ruins
environments.description: Collapsed skyscrapers overtaken by prehistoric vegetation, flickering holograms

environments.name: Digital Watering Hole
environments.description: Glowing pool of liquid data surrounded by chrome ferns

environments.name: Observation Point
environments.description: High cliff overlooking merged timeline cityscape

prompt_construction.template: Cinematic shot of {character} {action} in {environment}, {camera_movement} camera, {lighting_style} lighting with {color_palette}, {mood} atmosphere, {visual_effects}, photorealistic with {art_style} aesthetic
prompt_construction.example: Cinematic shot of chrome-scaled T-Rex charging through neon-lit prehistoric jungle, rapid shake camera, strobe neon lighting with green/pink/yellow palette, aggressive atmosphere, VHS distortion and glitch artifacts, photorealistic with cyberpunk aesthetic
